conditions.short_description: Það er kominn snjór til fjalla í flestum landshlutum en ekki í miklum mæli og mikið hefur tekið upp aftur í hlýindum og rigningu. Það ætti ekki að vera mikil lagskipting í snjónum og er hann talinn no
conditions.full_description: There is snow now in the mountains in most parts of the country, but not in large amount and a lot has melted away again, especially in lower parts. There should not be much layering on the snow and the snow is expected to be mostly stable, but above approx 1000 m there could still be some dry snow that has not gone through thaw.

area_forecast.forecast: Rather little snow remains in the mountains, and it has melted and settled and also gone through some melt/freeze cycles and is considered stable.
area_forecast.snow_condition: Rather little snow remains in the mountains, and it has melted and settled and also gone through some melt/freeze cycles and is considered stable.

area_forecast.forecast: Snow has accumulated in gullies and there are still possible windslabs in southerly aspects high in starting zones and just below ridges. The snow has subside, gain strength and melted last days in mild weather.
area_forecast.snow_condition: Snow has accumulated in gullies and there are still possible windslabs in southerly aspects high in starting zones and just below ridges. The snow has subside, gain strength and melted last days in mild weather.
area_forecast.weather: Stíf austlæg átt um helgina og áfram fremur milt en vægt frost til fjalla og lítilsháttar él

area_forecast.forecast: The new snow from last week has mostly melted, especially in lower part of mountains. Snow remaining in the mountains has subsided and should become increasingly stable with cool weather this week.
area_forecast.recent_avalances: No recent reports but a few avalanches fell in the area last week.
area_forecast.snow_condition: The new snow from last week has mostly melted, especially in lower part of mountains. Snow remaining in the mountains has subsided and should become increasingly stable with cool weather this week.
area_forecast.weather: Stíf austlæg átt um helgina. Hiti yfir frostmarki á láglendi en vægt frost til fjalla

area_forecast.forecast: New snow expected over the weekend. Older snow is found in gullies and depressions, while ridges are bare. The old snow has subsided and gone through melt/freeze cycles and is considered stable.
area_forecast.snow_condition: New snow expected over the weekend. This snow could accumulate evenly in light winds inland, but possibly small windslabs in the highest mountains and just below mountain ridges. Older snow is found in gullies and depressions, while ridges are bare. The old snow has subsided and gone through melt/freeze cycles and is considered stable.
area_forecast.weather: Bætist á snjó um helgina ofarlega í fjöll í austlægri átt. Ekki gert ráð fyrir miklum vindi og gæti snjórinn safnast jafnt yfir eða litla vindfleka. Neðan u.þ.b. 400 m ætti að rigna.

weather_forecast.forecast: Calm weather next days, mild temperatures and little precipitation. Some mild snowshowers in the northern parts along the coast. Frost in the mountains.
